name: Zombie Party: Halloween Dozer
description:
A Coin Pushing Table with Zombies?! Woa! Spin the Wheel of Fortune, win PRIZES in Zombie SLOTS, and bank as many COINS as possible on this chilling table!

Come join the fun NOW! Zombie Party: Halloween Dozer Features:

- Top-notch 3D graphics!
- Zombie Slots: Our slot machine mini-game to win tons of prizes
- Fortune Wheel: Spin the wheel of fortune to win special rewards
- Dozens of crazy prizes to collect!
- Monthly live events and special mysterious characters!
- Enchanting quest mode with hundreds of missions to complete
- Superb coin physics, special effects and animations
- Magical chips with unique dozer powers that can be upgraded
- Compete on leaderboards and unlock achievements
- Look out for awesome new updates!

For support and issues please contact coinparty@mindstormstudios.com
Visit our Facebook page to get connected with the active community https://www.facebook.com/coinparty
